message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation skills, but I'm firm on the value this product brings.  I can do $12,500, but that's my final offer.
I understand you're firm on the value, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we meet in the middle again at $12,250? I'm willing to compromise, but I don't want to go above that.
